sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" /* Now using object destructuring to pull out the individual keys in the `props` object that gets passed to this component. https://tylermcginnis.com/videos/object-array-destructuring/ */ const DetailCard = ({id, name, resource, date, rating, venueId, venueName, venueCity, venueCapacity, venueState, audienceName, audienceId, spotName, spotId}) => { return ( <>
{name}

Date: {date}

Set Rating: {rating ? rating : ""}

Venue Name: {venueName}

City: {venueCity ? venueCity : ""}

State: {venueState ? venueState : ""}

Seating Capacity: {venueCapacity ? venueCapacity : ""}

Type Of Audience: {audienceName ? audienceName : ""}

Spot Order: {spotName ? spotName : ""}

{ Details }
) } export default DetailCard
